entry.title: AngelHack Day
entry.content:
http://snacks.dreambuff.com
    The Entrance Of Your Mobile Web App. Here Your Go!

Two Wonderful Days

Last Satuday, I join a hackthon in IKC with my friends wov. Why I attend this activity? Maybe lacking practice of program makes me feel unset.

We met another friend, a graduate from DongNan Univercity, a very nice boy. we plan to start a project based on HTML5. This project provide an entrance of Web App. As we all know, web app become more and more popular in china , Almost all componies begin to pay more attentions to it, that’s great!

Division of labor

I used to write backend services before, so zjh and I were in charge of writing backend program. wov is good at frontend program, that’s his job. the backend program’s main language is nodejs, A javascript framework base on commonjs. OK, we were programing as this …

Episode before end

There will be half an hour before the end. After merging an code writen by wov, the picture can’t present correctly . that’s not an good news, we must fix this bug. fortunately, we fix this bug at last.

Write at the end

This activity is very meaningful, we met a new friend. we can complete a project in two days. if our passing is existed, the sky will be always blue.

entry.title: No Response For A Long Time
entry.content:
Have a long time not to update my blog, Something confusing me, I have not enough passion to exploer new floor.

I should slow my pace and think about that happens to me. What is my dream? What is my target? What should i be tomorrow? Life is tough, how can i face it.

Interesting things. And what?

Find more interesting things, Think more and not just run, when your passion is exhausted, what you can?

Keep reading. Every book has its special meanings for you!

Come on! encourage myself!

entry.title: Campaign For Manager
entry.content: I join campaign for iOS Developer Manager this afternoon. Actually this is my second time stand at this stage, feeling little nervers. about 9 other managers review my campaign speech, they ask some questions about my management in iOS department this half of year. Thanks for this chance, if i was elected finally, i will do my best to become a excellent manager.

entry.title: New Career! Am I A Developer?
entry.content:
Today is Wednesday, A teamleader of my team come back, he have planed to leave team in 2 weeks, at last he decide to stay here, I’m glad to hear that this morning and he is the first person who turns his heart in my manage career.

I know I am not a developer at the moment, I’m a manager, if my leader give me a work, I can do it well, more than they expect, that’s good feel.

Choice between “do things right” and “do right thing”, maybe i needn’t to choose, they can both exist, doing things right is the base ability of a manager, more than this, we should do right thing and lead the team to the right direction.

entry.title: Hot Day, Passion Release
entry.content:
The temperature is above 35 centidegrees for about a week, Many people have no energy to do what they should do, No passion, feel exhausting…

I’ll not do like this. Release my Passion, in this hot day. Too many excited things i wanna face .
